landing.heroTitle: Edvance - ACE: Access to Careers & Education
landing.heroGradient: First platform of its kind in the world to combine education and career paths in one integrated system
landing.heroDescription: University students and fresh graduates face difficulty finding jobs that match their skills
landing.heroSubDescription: We transform the way of learning and employment into one connected experience
landing.mathematics: The Gap Between Education and Employment
landing.physics: In today's world, education and jobs run on completely separate tracks
landing.chemistry: Students learn, but don't know how to connect their education to real job opportunities
landing.seatsAvailablePlural: A huge gap between education and the job market, wasting enormous effort, time, and opportunities
landing.feature1Description: First platform of its kind to combine LMS + Job Platforms in one system
landing.feature2Description: We assess your actual skills and directly connect you with suitable companies
landing.feature3Description: Direct connection between university students and companies based on their actual skills
landing.feature4Description: All services completely free for students and graduates - no hidden fees whatsoever
landing.registeredStudents: First in the world to combine education & employment
landing.distinguishedTeachers: An integrated system never delivered with this efficiency before
landing.dailyLectures: Effective bridge between education, skills, and jobs
landing.governorates: In one connected and integrated system

about.title: About Edvance
about.description: An innovative idea inspired by global systems, but with a completely new execution appearing for the first time
about.heroSubtitle: An innovative idea inspired by global systems, but with a completely new execution appearing for the first time
about.missionDescription: We transform the way of learning and employment into one connected experience. The student becomes closer to their career future, the teacher closer to their achievements, companies closer to the competencies they seek, and parents closer to peace of mind about their children.
about.missionPoint3Description: Fastest and most efficient path from learning to employment
about.stat2: A huge gap between education and the job market
about.stat3: Inspired by the best experiences globally
about.storyPhase1Description: Studying user needs, defining technical and functional system requirements
about.storyPhase2Description: Designing interactive and easy interfaces for all categories, preparing visual identity and ACE brand, building initial prototype to test the idea
about.storyPhase3Description: Developing Frontend (Next.js), building Backend (Laravel), creating organized database to manage users, courses, and jobs, mapping user journey for each category
about.storyPhase4Description: Official platform launch in universities and schools, establishing partnerships with companies to provide training and employment opportunities, regional and global expansion with AI and advanced analytics
about.teamSubtitle: A young and passionate team to create real change
about.valueQualityDescription: Fastest and most efficient path from learning to employment
about.ctaDescription: Edvance - ACE: Where Education Meets Your Career Future

faqItems.question: What exactly is Edvance - ACE?
faqItems.answer:
Edvance platform uses the ACE concept (Access to Careers & Education) - the world's first platform of its kind combining:
- Learning Management System (LMS)
- Job Platform
- Real and accurate skills assessment
- Direct company connection

All in one completely integrated system.

faqItems.question: How is Edvance different from other educational platforms?
faqItems.answer: Other platforms focus only on education. Edvance takes you directly from learning → to employment. We don't just provide courses, we connect you with real job opportunities and prepare you for the job market.

faqItems.question: And why is it different from job sites?
faqItems.answer: Job sites only display jobs. Edvance helps you develop your skills first, assesses them accurately, then connects you with the right job. We prepare you, develop you, then employ you.

faqItems.question: Who is the primary target audience?
faqItems.answer:
Edvance is precisely designed for:
- University students (Undergraduates)
- Fresh graduates (Fresh Graduates)

Who are looking for:
✓ Practical skills development
✓ Real training and employment opportunities
✓ Direct connection with companies based on their skills

faqItems.question: Can teachers join?
faqItems.answer:
Absolutely! Teachers are an essential part of ACE. They can:
- Create educational courses
- Assess students
- Recommend them to companies
- Earn additional income

faqItems.question: Can companies join?
faqItems.answer:
Yes! Companies can:
- Post job openings
- Search for qualified talent
- Hire efficiently
- Access pre-assessed candidates

faqItems.question: How does ACE work?
faqItems.answer:
1. Student registers and completes profile
2. Takes courses and develops skills
3. System assesses real skills
4. Student gets matched with suitable job opportunities
5. Companies receive qualified candidates

Everything in one integrated system.

faqItems.question: Is it really free for students?
faqItems.answer:
Yes! All services are completely free for students and graduates:
✓ Course registration
✓ Skills assessment
✓ Job applications
✓ Company connections

No hidden fees whatsoever.

faqItems.question: What types of courses are available?
faqItems.answer:
Courses vary between:
- Technical skills (programming, design, etc.)
- Soft skills (communication, leadership)
- Professional certificates
- Career preparation

All aligned with actual job market needs.

faqItems.question: How are skills assessed?
faqItems.answer:
Through:
- Practical assignments
- Final projects
- Comprehensive exams
- Portfolio evaluation

AI-powered system ensures accurate assessment.

faqItems.question: How do I apply for jobs?
faqItems.answer:
After completing courses and skills assessment:
1. Browse available opportunities
2. Apply with one click
3. Your profile automatically sent to companies
4. Wait for company response

Your ACE profile serves as your comprehensive CV.

faqItems.question: What's the success rate of getting hired?
faqItems.answer:
ACE provides:
✓ Real skills assessment
✓ Smart job matching
✓ Direct company connection

This significantly increases your chances of getting the right job quickly.

faqItems.question: Can parents monitor their children?
faqItems.answer:
Yes! Parents get a dedicated dashboard to:
- Monitor academic progress
- Track course completion
- View skills development
- Follow job applications

Complete transparency and peace of mind.

faqItems.question: Is ACE available on mobile?
faqItems.answer:
Yes! The platform is fully responsive and works on:
- Desktop computers
- Tablets
- Smartphones

Mobile app coming soon for iOS and Android.

faqItems.question: What makes Edvance unique?
faqItems.answer:
Edvance is the world's FIRST platform to:
✓ Combine education + employment in one system
✓ Provide integrated and accurate skills assessment
✓ Connect students directly with companies based on real skills
✓ Offer everything completely free for students and graduates

In one completely integrated unified system.

faqItems.question: How do I get started?
faqItems.answer:
Simple!
1. Register on the platform (100% free)
2. Complete your profile
3. Browse and enroll in courses
4. Develop your skills
5. Start applying for jobs

Your career journey starts here!

defaultResponses.greeting: Hello! Welcome to Edvance. How can I assist you?
defaultResponses.help:
I'm here to help you with:
• Course information
• Registration process
• Technical support
• General questions

What would you like to know?
defaultResponses.courses: You can browse our available courses from the Courses page. We offer live streaming and recorded courses for all grade levels.
defaultResponses.registration:
To register:
1. Click 'Join Free' button
2. Select your account type
3. Fill in your information
4. Verify your email

It's completely free!
defaultResponses.contact:
You can contact us via:
• Email: support@edvance.com
• WhatsApp: +20 123 456 7890
• Or use this chat!
defaultResponses.thanks: You're welcome! Feel free to ask if you need anything else.
defaultResponses.default: I'm still learning! For complex questions, please contact our support team at support@edvance.com
